Translations.Text: They ask vos Zul-Qarnain. dictus ego narrate vos some de his history
Nos granted eum authority terra provisus eum totus generis de means
When he reached far west he invenit sun setting vast ocean invenit people ibi! Nos dictus O Zul-Qarnain vos dominus prout vos wish either punish est generis to them
He dictus "Prout pro those transgress nos punish them; tunc when they return their Dominus He commit them multus retribution
Prout pro those believe lead righteous vita they receive bonus reward nos treat them kindly
When he reached far east he invenit sun rising people habet nihil shelter them ex it
Naturally nos est fully aware de everything he invenit
When he reached valley 2 palisades he invenit people whose language est barely understandable
They dictus O Zul-Qarnain Gog Magog est corruptors terra. Nos pay vos potuit create barrier nos them
He dictus My Dominus dedit me major bounties. Vos cooperate me ego build dam vos them
Bring me masses de iron Dodum he filled gap 2 palisades he dictus Blow Dodum est rufus hot he dictus Help me pour tar it
Sic they non climb it nor could they bore holes it
He dictus Hoc est mercy my Dominus. When prophecy my Dominus advenit pass He causa dam crumble prophecy my Dominus est truth
Apud ut temporis, nos let them invade 1 alias tunc horn blown nos summon them totus unus
Nos presens Hell ut feria disbelievers
They est unus eyes too veiled vide My message Nor could they hear
